title: An Update on Healthcare Investing
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and healthcare industry reporter Josh Nathan-Kazis discuss drug companies' latest earnings, the latest news on Covid-19 treatments and vaccines, and the outlook for healthcare stocks.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and healthcare industry reporter Josh Nathan-Kazis discuss drug companies' latest earnings, the latest news on Covid-19 treatments and vaccines, and the outlook for healthcare stocks.
